Czarcoin is a platform built to enhance Autonomous Distributed Representation

An open source cryptocurrency to enable realtime transactions amongst peers. Utilizing a powerful decentralized network, it serves as a foundation for commerce. Each owner is empowered with the self management of their stake. The most advanced implementation of an open digital ecomony with a conservative approach to sustainability. Members of this network are rewarded proportionally for their contributions.

Czarparty

A collection of tools to enable global asset management that is secured by the Czarcoin Network. Free Trade is encoraged and supported by the existance of smart contracts and deriviatives. Designed to eliminate risk between factions, this comprehensive suite enables a universal marketplace for everyone.
